hero.title: Premier Property
hero.subtitle: Find exceptional investment opportunities through our curated property auctions - where quality meets value.

register.title: 1. Register
register.description: Create an account on our platform to access auction listings. You'll need to provide identification and contact information for verification purposes.

getApproved.title: 2. Get Approved
getApproved.description: Before bidding, you'll need to be approved for specific auction types. This may include providing proof of funds or a deposit depending on the property value.

attendAuction.title: 3. Attend Auction
attendAuction.description: Join our online auctions at the scheduled time, or participate in in-person events at the designated locations. You can place bids within your pre-approved limit.

completePurchase.title: 4. Complete Purchase
completePurchase.description: If you're the winning bidder, follow the payment instructions and complete all required paperwork within the specified timeframe to finalize your property purchase.

about.title: About Our Auctions
about.subtitle: Premium real estate auctions designed for visionary investors and discerning buyers

premiumOpportunities.title: Premium Opportunities
premiumOpportunities.description: We are leaders in delivering premium real estate opportunities through meticulously curated auctions designed for discerning investors. Our auctions feature an exceptional selection of properties, from luxury residences and prime commercial assets to high-yield investment opportunities â€” all within a transparent and competitive bidding environment through the approved platforms within the Kingdom.

rigorousDueDiligence.title: Rigorous Due Diligence
rigorousDueDiligence.description: With rigorous due diligence and in-depth market intelligence, we ensure every auction offers unparalleled value and transparency. Our live auction events are where exceptional deals unfold, connecting discerning buyers with exclusive opportunities that rarely reach the open market.

discoverOpportunities.title: Discover Opportunities
discoverOpportunities.description: Browse our collection of past successful sales and upcoming auction opportunities to discover your next premium real estate investment. Join our exclusive network of investors and gain access to exceptional properties before they hit the open market.

featured.title: Featured Upcoming Auctions
featured.subtitle: Exceptional properties coming to auction soon with premium locations and amenities
featured.noAuctions: No featured auctions available at the moment.
featured.checkBack: Check back soon or browse our other available properties.

upcoming.title: All Upcoming Auctions
upcoming.subtitle: Browse all available properties coming to auction

past.title: Recently Ended Auctions
past.subtitle: Properties that were previously listed in our auctions

cta.title: Interested in Our Auction Properties?
cta.subtitle: Contact our team to learn more about upcoming auctions, property viewings, and how you can participate.
